languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс вскидывает руку, приказывая остановиться, а затем прикладывает указательный палец к губам. Его лицо напряжено больше обычного, а во взгляде сквозит сомнение. Дознаватель жестами указывает на выход.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс вскидывает руку, приказывая остановиться, а затем прикладывает указательный палец к губам. Его лицо напряжено больше обычного, а во взгляде сквозит сомнение. Дознаватель жестами указывает на выход.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix raises a hand, commanding you to stop, and then presses an index finger to his lips. His face is more tense than usual, and there is a semblance of doubt in his eyes. The Interrogator gestures toward the exit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс вскидывает руку, приказывая остановиться, а затем прикладывает указательный палец к губам. Его лицо напряжено больше обычного, а во взгляде сквозит сомнение. Дознаватель жестами указывает на выход.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix raises a hand, commanding you to stop, and then presses an index finger to his lips. His face is more tense than usual, and there is a look of doubt in his eyes. The Interrogator gestures toward the exit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix raises a hand, commanding you to stop, and then presses an index finger to his lips. His face is more tense than usual, and there is a semblance of doubt in his eyes. The Interrogator gestures toward the exit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix raises a hand, commanding you to stop, and then presses an index finger to his lips. His face is more tense than usual, and there is a semblance of doubt in his eyes. The Interrogator gestures toward the exit.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは手を上げて立ち止まるよう指示し、人差し指を唇に押し当てる。いつもより緊張した表情で、その目には疑惑の色が浮かんでいる。インテロゲイターは出口に向けてジェスチャーをした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises a hand, commanding you to stop, and then presses an index finger to his lips. His face is more tense than usual, and there is a semblance of doubt in his eyes. The Interrogator gestures toward the exit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは手を上げて立ち止まるよう指示し、人差し指を唇に押し当てる。いつもより緊張した表情で、その目には疑惑の色が浮かんでいる。インテロゲイターは出口に向けてジェスチャーをした。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix levanta una mano, conminándote a detenerte, y se lleva el índice a los labios. Con gesto más tenso de lo habitual y con una mirada dubitativa, el Interrogador indica la salida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises a hand, commanding you to stop, and then presses an index finger to his lips. His face is more tense than usual, and there is a semblance of doubt in his eyes. The Interrogator gestures toward the exit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix levanta una mano, conminándote a detenerte, y se lleva el índice a los labios. Con gesto más tenso de lo habitual y con una mirada dubitativa, el Interrogador indica la salida.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希举起一只手，示意你停下，随后伸出食指贴在嘴唇上。他目露怀疑之色，比平时更加严肃，无声地朝出口的方向打了个手势。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises a hand, commanding you to stop, and then presses an index finger to his lips. His face is more tense than usual, and there is a semblance of doubt in his eyes. The Interrogator gestures toward the exit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希举起一只手，示意你停下，随后伸出食指贴在嘴唇上。他目露怀疑之色，比平时更加严肃，无声地朝出口的方向打了个手势。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lève la main pour vous indiquer de vous arrêter, puis place son index sur ses lèvres. Son visage est plus tendu qu'à l'ordinaire et vous y décelez même un semblant de doute. L'interrogateur vous désigne la sortie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises a hand, commanding you to stop, and then presses an index finger to his lips. His face is more tense than usual, and there is a semblance of doubt in his eyes. The Interrogator gestures toward the exit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lève la main pour vous indiquer de vous arrêter, puis place son index sur ses lèvres. Son visage est plus tendu qu'à l'ordinaire et vous y décelez même un semblant de doute. L'interrogateur vous désigne la sortie.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hebt eine Hand, um dir Einhalt zu gebieten, und legt sich den Zeigefinger auf die Lippen. Sein Gesicht ist angespannter als üblich, und in seinen Augen liegt ein Hauch von Zweifel. Der Interrogator deutet in Richtung des Ausgangs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises a hand, commanding you to stop, and then presses an index finger to his lips. His face is more tense than usual, and there is a semblance of doubt in his eyes. The Interrogator gestures toward the exit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hebt eine Hand, um dir Einhalt zu gebieten, und legt sich den Zeigefinger auf die Lippen. Sein Gesicht ist angespannter als üblich, und in seinen Augen liegt ein Hauch von Zweifel. Der Interrogator deutet in Richtung des Ausgangs.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, bir elini kaldırıp durmanı buyurduktan sonra işaret parmağını dudaklarına bastırıyor. Yüzü her zamankinden daha gergin, gözlerinden şüphe okunuyor. Sorgucu, çıkışı işaret ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises a hand, commanding you to stop, and then presses an index finger to his lips. His face is more tense than usual, and there is a semblance of doubt in his eyes. The Interrogator gestures toward the exit.{/n}
